key_commands.description: List all pods in the namespace to confirm component readiness and identify targets for deeper inspection
List services and their ports to spot potential service port/targetPort issues
Check frontend gateway logs for request errors indicating downstream connection problems

key_commands.command: exec_shell("kubectl get pods -n test-social-network -o name | xargs -I {} sh -lc 'echo === {}; kubectl logs -n test-social-network {} --tail=400 --all<REPLICA_SUFFIX> | egrep -i \"error|exception|fail|panic|refused|timeout\" || true'")
key_commands.description: Aggregate recent error logs across all pods to pinpoint failing interactions and implicated services
key_commands.original_command: exec_shell("kubectl get pods -n test-social-network -o name | xargs -I {} sh -lc 'echo === {}; kubectl logs -n test-social-network {} --tail=400 --all-containers | egrep -i \"error|exception|fail|panic|refused|timeout\" || true'")

key_commands.command: exec_shell("kubectl get endpoints -n test-social-network post-storage-service -o yaml")
key_commands.description: Inspect the endpoints of post-storage-service to verify the discovered backend port wiring
key_commands.original_command: exec_shell("kubectl get endpoints -n test-social-network post-storage-service -o yaml")

key_commands.command: exec_shell("kubectl describe svc -n test-social-network post-storage-service && kubectl describe pod -n test-social-network post-storage-service-<POD_SUFFIX>")
key_commands.description: Correlate service TargetPort (9999) with pod container port (9090) to confirm targetPort misconfiguration root cause
key_commands.original_command: exec_shell("kubectl describe svc -n test-social-network post-storage-service && kubectl describe pod -n test-social-network post-storage-service-9bd8bd979-lrfz5")

key_commands.description: Submit the identified faulty component to complete the localization task
